name: Convention of Elements
flavorText: Long ago, a great conclave of mage-smiths convened during a blizzard to channel their collective energy into a single artifact, forging a powerful ring that bestowed upon the wielder mastery over all of the elements.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Gain 179% increased damage to a single element for 4 seconds. This non-static effect rotates through the elements available to your class in the following order: Arcane, Cold, Fire, Holy, Lightning, Physical, Poison. [150 - 200]%
